25#include "communications_tags.hpp"
26
27namespace bitpit {
28
37/*
38 Initialize communication tags instance.
39*/
40std::unique_ptr<CommunicationTags> CommunicationTags::m_instance = nullptr;
41
47CommunicationTags & CommunicationTags::instance()
48{
49 if (!m_instance) {
50 m_instance = std::unique_ptr<CommunicationTags>(new CommunicationTags());
51 }
52
53 return *m_instance;
54}
55
59CommunicationTags::CommunicationTags()
60{
61}
62
76int CommunicationTags::generate(MPI_Comm communicator)
77{
78 // Early return if the communicator is not valid
79 if (communicator == MPI_COMM_NULL) {
80 return IndexGenerator<int>::generate();
81 }
82
83 // The master generates a unique tag
84 int tag;
85
86 int rank;
87 MPI_Comm_rank(communicator, &rank);
88 if (rank == 0) {
89 tag = IndexGenerator<int>::generate();
90 }
91
92 // Share the tag among the processes
93 MPI_Bcast(&tag, 1, MPI_INT, 0, communicator);
94
95 return tag;
96}
97
105bool CommunicationTags::isAssigned(int tag, MPI_Comm communicator)
106{
107 // The master checks if the tag is assigned
108 bool assigned;
109
110 int rank;
111 MPI_Comm_rank(communicator, &rank);
112 if (rank == 0) {
113 assigned = IndexGenerator<int>::isAssigned(tag);
114 }
115
116 // Share the result among the processes
117 MPI_Bcast(&assigned, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, 0, communicator);
118
119 return assigned;
120}
121
128void CommunicationTags::setAssigned(int tag, MPI_Comm communicator)
129{
130 // Only the master needs to set the tag as assigned
131 int rank;
132 MPI_Comm_rank(communicator, &rank);
133 if (rank == 0) {
134 IndexGenerator<int>::setAssigned(tag);
135 }
136}
137
146void CommunicationTags::trash(int tag, MPI_Comm communicator)
147{
148 // Wait all the processes
149 //
150 // We need to avoid that a tag is trashed while some processes are still
151 // using it.
152 MPI_Barrier(communicator);
153
154 // Only the master needs to trash the tag
155 int rank;
156 MPI_Comm_rank(communicator, &rank);
157 if (rank == 0) {
158 IndexGenerator<int>::trash(tag);
159 }
160}
161
162// Communication manager global functions
163namespace communications {
164
170 CommunicationTags & tags()
171 {
172 return CommunicationTags::instance();
173 }
174
175}
176
177}
